= Developer Resoures =

== Standards ==

 * [http://standards.freedesktop.org/desktop-entry-spec/desktop-entry-spec-latest.html Freedesktop desktop entry specification] (used for `.desktop` files)
 * [http://freedesktop.org/wiki/Standards_2fshared_2dmime_2dinfo_2dspec File associations based on MIME type]
    * The [http://rox.sourceforge.net/desktop/static.html ROX Desktop] MIME-Editor software is helpful for this.
    * Trying a [http://www.fedoraforum.org/forum/archive/index.php/t-26875.html manual approach] does not seem to work well.
    * [http://primates.ximian.com/~federico/docs/gnome-isv-guide/index.html Integrating existing software with GNOME] (from Ximian)
    * [http://www.ces.clemson.edu/linux/fc4_desktop.shtml Some instructions for GNOME 2.10 and KDE 3.4] (these were helpful in getting the file icon association working)
 * [http://freedesktop.org/wiki/Standards/icon-theme-spec Freedsktop icon theme specification]
